books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.

books.description: Cullen Post, a lawyer and Episcopal minister, antagonizes some ruthless killers when he takes on a wrongful conviction case.

books.description: The 27th book in the Alex Cross series. Copycat crimes make the detective question whether an innocent man was executed.

books.description: When Atlee Pine returns to her hometown to investigate her sister’s kidnapping from 30 years ago, she winds up tracking a potential serial killer.
books.title: A MINUTE TO MIDNIGHT

books.description: Children with special talents are abducted and sequestered in an institution where the sinister staff seeks to extract their gifts through harsh methods.
books.title: THE INSTITUTE

books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university. Read by Julia Whelan. 12 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EDUCATED

books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady describes how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent. Read by the author. 19 hours, 3 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BECOMING

books.author: Donald Trump Jr
books.description: Forays into politics and views on liberals from the executive vice president of the Trump Organization. Read by James Edward Thomas and the author. 9 hours, 41 minutes unabridged.
books.title: TRIGGERED

books.description: A psychotherapist becomes another therapist’s patient. Read by Brittany Pressley. 14 hours, 21 minutes unabridged.
books.title: MAYBE YOU SHOULD TALK TO SOMEONE

books.author: Rachel Maddow
books.description: The MSNBC host argues that the global oil and gas industry has weakened democracies and bolstered authoritarians. Read by the author. 15 hours, 33 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BLOWOUT

books.description: The story of Quanah Parker, the last chief of the Comanches. Read by David Drummond. 15 hours, 3 minutes unabridged.

books.description: A consideration of how humans survived during pivotal historic moments. Read by the author. 7 hours, 55 minutes unabridged.

books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Gregory Zuckerman
books.description: How the mathematician Jim Simons analyzed data to advance algorithmic trading, which has impacted financial and political spheres. Read by Will Damron. 10 hours, 44 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE MAN WHO SOLVED THE MARKET

books.author: Ali Wong
books.description: The comedian dispenses her brand of wisdom through letters to her children. Read by Justin Hakuta and the author. 6 hours, 20 minutes unabridged.

books.description: A memoir by the host of “The Daily Show." Read by the author. 8 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
